thread.title_full: Mike Heika answers your Stars questions at 2 p.m. Monday, Oct. 19; ask your questions now | Dallas Morning News

author: Mike Heika
title: Mike Heika answers your Stars questions at 2 p.m. Monday, Oct. 19; ask your questions now
text:
Mike Heika, Stars beat writer for SportsDayDFW.com and The Dallas Morning News, answers your questions about the team in a live chat at 2 p.m. Monday. Ask your questions in the ScribbleLive module below, and Mike will discuss them for an hour or so.
Click here to enjoy the chat on your mobile and tablet devices.
On Twitter:
 @MikeHeika
